item.title: First Post
item.description: Why even blog? So then this is probably going to be a pretty boring intro to what I’m trying to get at by blogging. I spend a lot time on the internet, it’s actually more surprising when I don’t find myself on it. I’m easily distracted when I’m trying to be productive and have a hard time trying to focus. There are specific things I’d like to achieve by blogging

item.title: Who is this Guy?!
item.description: I’m Ravi Ramesh Arvind. You can find a better description on my Linkedin if you’re looking to hire me. What am I doing? Trying to make sense of things like AlphaGo, Code2Vec and Neural Turing Machines. Doing my master’s degree from Georgia Tech via its Online Master’s in Computer Science program. Work Experience Fullstack engineer at Endurance India between 2016-2018, working mostly on React/Node.js/Java Stack. Interned at Morgan Stanley working on a visualization platform to identify performance bottlenecks.
